import './ShoppingCard.css' import { Offcanvas,Stack } from "react-bootstrap"; import { useShopingCard } from '../../context/Shopping' import CardItem from '../CardItem/CardItem' const ShoppingCard = ({isOpen})=>{ const {cartItems,closeCard} = useShopingCard() return Card {cartItems.map((item) => ( ))}
} export default ShoppingCard
